fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports

Interface PortI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataInboundPortI, DataOutboundPortI, InboundPortI, OutboundPortI, TwoWayPortI<TWI>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataInboundPort, AbstractDataInboundPortForPlugin, AbstractDataOutboundPort, AbstractDataOutboundPortForPlugin, AbstractDataTwoWayPort, AbstractDataTwoWayPortForPlugin, AbstractInboundPort, AbstractInboundPortForPlugin, AbstractOutboundPort, AbstractPort, AbstractTwoWayPort, AbstractTwoWayPortForPlugin, DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestInboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort, ExampleInboundPort, ExampleOutboundPort, IntegerFilteringInboundPort, IntegerFilteringOutboundPort, IntegerProcessingInboundPort, IntegerProcessingOutboundPort, IntercessionInboundPort, IntercessionOutboundPort, IntrospectionInboundPort, IntrospectionOutboundPort, MapReadingInboundPort, MapReadingOutboundPort, MapWritingInboundPort, MapWritingOutboundPort, MyServiceInboundPort, MyServiceOutboundPort, PairDataInboundPort, PairDataOutboundPort, PingPongDataInboundPort, PingPongDataOutboundPort, PingPongDataTwoWayPort, PingPongInboundPort, PingPongOutboundPort, PingPongTwoWayPort, PushControlInboundPort, PushControlOutboundPort, ReflectionInboundPort, ReflectionOutboundPort, URIConsumerLaunchInboundPort, URIConsumerLaunchOutboundPort, URIConsumerOutboundPort, URIProviderInboundPort, URIProviderInboundPort, ValueProvidingInboundPort, ValueProvidingOutboundPort

    public interface PortI
    The interface PortI provides for a common supertype for all ports in the component model.

    Description

    In the component model, a port represent a plug through which components can be connected using connectors. On the implementation side, ports are objects through which a client component calls its provider components, and also through which a provider component is called by its client components.

    Invariant

     invariant              this.getPortURI() != null
 invariant              this.getOwner() != null
 invariant              this.getImplementedInterface() != null
 invariant              ComponentServiceI.class.isAssignableFrom(this.getImplementedInterface())
 invariant              this.getOwner().isInterface(this.getImplementedInterface())
 invariant              this.isDistributedlyPublished() implies this.isPublished()

    Created on : 2011-11-07

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
